name: Sky Ball
description: In this game you will visit the heavenly islands. Manage the ball get to the final point without falling, while you decide to solve all kinds of puzzles.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or Newer Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 260 or ATI 4850 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or Newer Processor: 2.5+ GHz Quad core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660 or better, ATI 7950 or better DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
